attributes.action: Explain why legal drugs (alcohol,nicotine) kill more people than illegal drugs
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: There has never been a satisfactory explanation from any politician for this. If tax revenue is the reason then why not say so.

rejection.details:
This petition overlaps with several already in existence –
http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/drugcommission/
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
